title: The wonderful praise of money, or An account of the many evils that attend the ill use thereof. Money when us'd and not abus'd, will do men good we know; but when they shall consume it all, it proves their overthrow. Tune of, Ye ladies of London. This may be printed, R.P.
publisher: Printed by P. Brooksby, at the Golden-Ball in Pye-Corner, near West-Smithfield.,
